Name: Cat
Text: You know, the world's a terribly dangerous place.

Name: Cat
Text: Take it from me, hotshot. I've certainly lived long enough to know it.

Name: Cat
Text: Always scrounging around for your next meal, eating any little drag- I mean, morsels that come along your way.

Name: Me
Text: Back off, beast. I've got claws and you'll find me very prickly.

Name: Me
Text: Besides, I'm too important to be eaten by the likes of you.

Name: Me
Text: I'm a ruthless terrifying dragon! And I am going to kidnap the princess of this land!

Name: Cat
Text: Arrogant little creature. Off you go, then.
